name: CatchOnFire
description:
Set fire and burn down as many houses as you can. Let see how much damage you can do before they put it out.

Entry for GMTK GameJam 2020

Made by: mt_2a

Music & SFX: 魔王魂 
(https://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/)

Graphical Asset:
GothicVania Town Asset Pack(Modified) By Ansimuz @ Unity Asset Store
 

Font:

MingLiU By Fonts2u.com
